Class IPUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gat.engine.IPUtils
public class IPUtils
extends Object

Some utilities that deal with IPv4 addresses.

Method Detail

isLoopbackAddress

public static boolean isLoopbackAddress(InetAddress addr)
Returns true if the specified address is a loopback address. Loopback means in the 127.*.*.* range.

Parameters:
addr - the specified address.
Returns:
true if addr is a loopback address.

isLinkLocalAddress

public static boolean isLinkLocalAddress(InetAddress addr)
Returns true if the specified address is a link local address. Link local means in the 169.254.*.* range.

Parameters:
addr - the specified address.
Returns:
true if addr is a link local address.

isSiteLocalAddress

public static boolean isSiteLocalAddress(InetAddress addr)
Returns true if the specified address is a site local address. Site local means in the 10.*.*.*, or the 172.[16-32].*.*, or the 192.168.*.* range.

Parameters:
addr - the specified address.
Returns:
true if addr is a site local address.

isExternalAddress

public static boolean isExternalAddress(InetAddress addr)
Returns true if the specified address is an external address. External means not a site local, link local, or loopback address.

Parameters:
addr - the specified address.
Returns:
true if addr is an external address.

getLocalHostName

public static String getLocalHostName()
Returns the hostname associated with the local host.

getLocalHostAddress

public static InetAddress getLocalHostAddress()
Returns the InetAddressassociated with the local host.
